title: Battery level is stuck at 79%
content:
I have tried rebooting, which didn't help. I am waiting for the OTA Android 11 update to appear in the System Update, but nothing has come up. I'm hoping that would resolve this issue.

After August 2020 update, I have also been facing issue of Dark screen during unlock. I keep finger on finger print, nothing happens. I click on power button to unlock using PIN, nothing happens on the screen. Although, as soon as I connect the charger, the screen automatically lits up, with fingerprint working as well. 

This is all weird.  

I have read many forums and haven't found any one solution that has worked for anyone. 

I was a fan of Pixel phones for their camera, simplicity and free Google storage for the photos, and this is my second Pixel actually. I do not really want to switch, but after all these issues, it feels like Google wants me to switch. Sad!
